New Records: The Clippers converted 14 offensive rebounds into 20 second-chance points
Key Match Events: Harden adroitly fouled rookie center Yves Missi, whose 12-point, nine-rebound and five-block performance was tarnished by his missed free throw
Ivica Zubac won the tip back to Harden, who made two more free throws with less than two seconds remaining
CJ McCollum shot from half court and hit the front rim
Post-Match Reflections: The Clippers have won three straight and five of six
The Pelicans led by as many as 14 points, but the Clippers closed the half on an 11-3 run
The Pelicans hit a season-best 18 3s in a game, but it wasn't enough
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers visit San Antonio on Tuesday night
The Pelicans visit Miami on Wednesday
The Clippers took advantage of their 40-35 rebounding edge and 56-44 edge in paint points
